external_references.description: Douglas Bienstock. (2022, August 18). You Can’t Audit Me: APT29 Continues Targeting Microsoft 365. Retrieved February 23, 2023.
National Cyber Security Centre. (2020, July 16). Advisory: APT29 targets COVID-19 vaccine development. Retrieved September 29, 2020.

description: [APT29](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0016) has used compromised identities to access networks via VPNs and Citrix.(Citation: NCSC APT29 July 2020)(Citation: Mandiant APT29 Microsoft 365 2022)
